text: H þurh godes gevu ænglelandes cining grete ealle mine biscopes & mine eorles & sciregereuan & ðegenas fræncisce & ænglisc on ðam sciran þe Raulf ærcebiscop & þe hyred æt cristescircean on Cantwareberig habbaþ land inne freondlice.
And ic kyðe eow þæt ic hæbbe heom geunnon þæt hi by on ælce þare lande wurþe þe hi hæfdon on Edwardes kinges dæge mines mæges And on willelmes kynges dæge mines fæder.

And saca and socnæ on strande & on streame on wudan and on feldan, tolnes & teames griðbreces & hamsocne forstealles and infangenes þioues, and flæmen feormðe ofer hire agen mæn binnan burgan & butan, swa full & swa forþ swa mine agene wicneres hit secan scoldan, and ouer swa fela ðegenas swa ic heom to geleten hebbe, & ic nelle þæt ænig man ænig ðing þær on tyo buton hi and heore wicnæres þe hi hit betæcon willaþ ne fræncisce ne ænglisce.
Forþan þingan þe ic hæbbe criste þas gerihte forgeuen minre sawle to alysednesse ealswa Eadward kyng & min fæder ær hæfdon.
And ic nelle geðauian þæt ænig man þis to brece be minan fullan freondscipe.
